title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, January 5, 2020
description: Featuring a poem by Louis Jenkins, who passed away at age 77 on December 21st. We loved featuring his wry words all these years on the Almanac. Rest in peace, Louis.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Featuring a poem by Louis Jenkins, who passed away at age 77 on December 21st. We loved featuring his wry words all these years on the Almanac. Rest in peace, Louis.
